### Webinar Overview

In the webinar you will learn:

* What is R and RStudio?
* Installation information for R and RStudio
* Useful tips and tricks in RStudio
* [How to Install Certara R Packages](https://certara.github.io/R-Certara/#installation-and-running-information)
  * RsNLME and other Certara.R packages
  * NLME Engine
  * Setup License
* [Run RsNLME model](https://certara.github.io/R-RsNLME/articles/installation.html#run-test-example-1)

R Packages Used: `Certara.RsNLME`, `readr`
